Description: The next generation of Yu-Gi-Oh battle it out at the Duel Academy. The semifinal round is here. Will the mysterious (and evil) David Rabb ruin everything?
Title: YU-GI-OH! GX, VOL. 7
Author: Naoyuki Kageyama

Description: Rin Okumura joins an exorcist academy in order to control his inner demon. Will his classmates find out about his satanic bloodline?
Title: BLUE EXORCIST, VOL. 3
Author: Kazue Kato

Description: Two brothers harmed in a ritual that was half magic/half science seek the legendary Philosopherâ€™s Stone to make things right. This edition collects volumes four, five and six of the regular series.
Title: FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST (3-IN-1 EDITION), VOL. 2
Author: Hiromu Arakawa

Description: This series is about grade-school boys who want to become professionals in the manga industry. Do they have what it takes?
Title: BAKUMAN, VOL. 6
Author: Tsugumi Ohba

Description: Poor Naruto: he must cope with a ninja summit and a target on the back of his good friend, Sasuke.
Title: NARUTO, VOL. 49
Author: Masashi Kishimoto

Description: Ichigo Kurosaki sees dead people and must help usher them safely into the afterlife. This edition contains volumes 4, 5 and 6 and features a story about a reality show with live exorcisms.
Title: BLEACH (3-IN-1 EDITION), VOL. 2
Author: Tite Kubo

Description: High school gets more difficult when Yamato discovers the puppet named Ultimo, who comes to life just in time for his nemesis Vice to arrive.
Title: KARAKURIDOJI ULTIMO, VOL. 1
Author: Stan Lee and Hiroyuki Takei
Contributor: by Stan Lee and Hiroyuki Takei

Description: This is the third volume of adventures for this after-school music club, but Mio is still getting stage fright. Will a part-time job help cure her shyness?
Title: K-ON, VOL. 3
Author: kakifly

Description: The first three volumes of the Negima! saga are collected here in which Negi Springfield, a recent graduate from a wizard academy, begins teaching at an all-girls high school.
Title: NEGIMA! MAGISTER NEGI MAGI, OMNIBUS 1
Author: Ken Akamatsu

Description: Naruto learns more secrets from his past and moves closer to discovering the identity of his nemesis, Pain.
Title: NARUTO, VOL. 47
Author: Masashi Kishimoto
